title: Total number of gang-related homicides in the United States 2012
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total number of homicides, containing a total of 6 data points.
Overall Total number of homicides has increased over the Year.
Total number of homicides is roughly increasing from 2007 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2011, and finally slightly increasing from 2011 to 2012.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Total number of homicides, about 2363.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Total number of homicides about 1659.0 was reached at Year 2008
